text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9aed729fe9e62536236875a42fb170d2c8fb3046|patch 8.2.2157: Vim9: can delete a Vim9 script variable from a function>
patch 8.2.2157: Vim9: can delete a Vim9 script variable from a function

Problem:    Vim9: can delete a Vim9 script variable from a function.
Solution:   Check the variable is defined in Vim9 script. (closes #7483)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2157: Vim9: can delete a Vim9 script variable from a function · vim/vim@9aed729
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2157: Vim9: can delete a Vim9 script variable from a function · vim/vim@9aed729
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: can delete a Vim9 script variable from a function. Solution: Check the variable is defined in Vim9 script. (closes #7483)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b5b77378bc35cb268c384e98c59f2bf8cb406270|patch 8.2.2156: Github actions run on pusing a tag>
patch 8.2.2156: Github actions run on pusing a tag

Problem:    Github actions run on pusing a tag.
Solution:   Don't run CI on tag push. Omit coveralls on pull-request.
            (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #7489)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2156: Github actions run on pusing a tag · vim/vim@b5b7737
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2156: Github actions run on pusing a tag · vim/vim@b5b7737
attachments.text: Problem: Github actions run on pusing a tag. Solution: Don't run CI on tag push. Omit coveralls on pull-request. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #7489)

Solution:   Remove the "git checkout HEAD^2" block.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8dd46e72cfb13b8de793c808ee009c45e881903a|patch 8.2.2152: screenpos() does not include the WinBar offset>
patch 8.2.2152: screenpos() does not include the WinBar offset

Problem:    screenpos() does not include the WinBar offset.
Solution:   Use W_WINROW() instead of directly using w_window. (closes #7487)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2152: screenpos() does not include the WinBar offset · vim/vim@8dd46e7
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2152: screenpos() does not include the WinBar offset · vim/vim@8dd46e7
attachments.text: Problem: screenpos() does not include the WinBar offset. Solution: Use W_WINROW() instead of directly using w_window. (closes #7487)

patch 8.2.2151: $dir not expanded when configure checks for moonjit

Problem:    $dir not expanded when configure checks for moonjit.
Solution:   Use double quotes instead of single quotes. (closes #7478)
